page.title: 16WORK SALTFORD WEST OF BATH
page.content: Saltford was once a farming community with small industries.Allfarming land is now worked by contract farmers,no farmers live in the area any more.Very few parents work in the village.{Fathers where they work} Bristol 60% Bath 5% Local 10% Travel 15%{Fathers type of work Manual 20% Office 65% Travel 15% {Mothers who work} Full time 10% Part time 55% Housewife 15% Many children don't see their fathers before 7 o'clock each evening.Many families live on an above average income and the cost of housing in the area is high.The future prospects on local employment is unlikely to change.A strong "green-belt"policy will keep Saltford about its present size for the next decade until housing needs change.
